title: KHR_character_skeleton_bindpose glTF Skin Extension
description: glTF extension that defines a canonical bind pose for the character's skeleton applied to individual skins.

poseType.description: The type of pose this bind pose represents.

bindPoses.description: Array of bind pose matrices corresponding directly to the skin's joints array. Each entry at index i corresponds to the joint at joints[i].

matrix.description: Column-major 4x4 matrix defining the joint's bind pose in model space.
